00079       class init_visitor :public CycleDetector {
00080       public:
00084        explicit init_visitor(TICK final)
00085          :m_final(final) {}
00090        init_visitor(init_visitor const &other) 
00091          :CycleDetector(other), m_final(other.m_final) {}
00093        virtual ~init_visitor() {}
00094        
00110        void finish_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {        
00111          if( is_valid(r) ) {
00112            if( !r->initialize(m_final) ) {
00113              g.isolate(r);
00114            }
00115          }
00116        }
00117       protected:
00123        TICK m_final;
00124 
00125       };
00126 
00149       class sync_scheduller :public CycleDetector {
00150       public:
00160        typedef std::list<graph::reactor_id> reactor_queue;
00161 
00175        explicit sync_scheduller(reactor_queue &sync_order)
00176          :m_sync(&sync_order) {}
00183        sync_scheduller(sync_scheduller const &other) 
00184          :CycleDetector(other), m_sync(other.m_sync) {}
00186        virtual ~sync_scheduller() {}
00187 
00197        void discover_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00198          // First encounter with r :
00199          //   - inform him that a new tick has started 
00200          //        this will result on dispatching its goals if possible
00201          if( is_valid(r) )
00202            r->newTick();
00203        }
00204        
00215        void finish_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00216          // Completed all the vertex below :
00217          //   - this the next candidate to be synchronized
00218          if( is_valid(r) )
00219            m_sync->push_back(r);
00220        }
00221 
00222       private:
00224        reactor_queue               *m_sync;
00225 
00226        sync_scheduller(); // no code in purpose
00227       };
00228       
00229       
00230 
00231     }
00232   }
00233 }

00244 TICK Agent::initialTick(Clock *clk) {
00245   return (NULL==clk)?0:clk->initialTick();
00246 }

00250 Agent::Agent(Symbol const &name, TICK final, Clock *clk) 
00251   :graph(name, initialTick(clk)), 
00252    m_clock(clk), m_finalTick(final) {
00253   m_proxy = new AgentProxy(*this);
00254   add_reactor(m_proxy);
00255 }
00256 
00257 Agent::Agent(std::string const &file_name, Clock *clk) 
00258   :m_clock(clk) {
00259   updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));
00260   m_proxy = new AgentProxy(*this);
00261   add_reactor(m_proxy);
00262   try {
00263     loadConf(file_name);
00264   } catch(TREX::utils::Exception const &e) {
00265     syslog("ERROR")<<"Exception caught while loading "<<file_name<<":\n"
00266                  <<e;
00267     throw;
00268   } catch(std::exception const &se) {
00269     syslog("ERROR")<<"C++ exception caught while loading "
00270                  <<file_name<<":\n"
00271                  <<se.what();
00272     throw;
00273   } catch(...) {
00274     syslog("ERROR")<<"Unknown exception caught while loading "
00275                  <<file_name;
00276     throw;
00277   }
00278 }

00280 Agent::Agent(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &conf, Clock *clk) 
00281   :m_clock(clk) {
00282   updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));
00283   m_proxy = new AgentProxy(*this);
00284   add_reactor(m_proxy);
00285   try {
00286     loadConf(conf);
00287   } catch(TREX::utils::Exception const &e) {
00288     syslog("ERROR")<<"Exception caught while loading XML:\n"
00289                  <<e;
00290     throw;
00291   } catch(std::exception const &se) {
00292     syslog("ERROR")<<"C++ exception caught while loading XML:\n"
00293                  <<se.what();
00294     throw;
00295   } catch(...) {
00296     syslog("ERROR")<<"Unknown exception caught while loading XML";
00297     throw;
00298   }
00299 }

00302 Agent::~Agent() {
00303   m_proxy = NULL;
00304   clear();
00305   if( NULL!=m_clock )
00306     delete m_clock;
00307 }

00309 // observers :
00310 
00311 bool Agent::missionCompleted() {
00312   if( count_reactors()<=1 ) {
00313     // If there's only one reactor left it is probably
00314     // my AgentProxy => no real reactor available
00315     syslog()<<"No reactor left.";
00316     return true;
00317   }
00318   return getCurrentTick()>m_finalTick;
00319 }
00320 
00321 // manipulators :
00322 
00323 bool Agent::setClock(Clock *clock) {
00324   if( NULL==m_clock ) {
00325     m_clock = clock;
00326     updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));
00327     return true;
00328   } else {
00329     delete clock;
00330     return false;
00331   }
00332 }

00334 void Agent::loadPlugin(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &pg) {
00335   Symbol name = parse_attr<Symbol>(pg, "name");
00336   m_pg->load(name);
00337 }

00339 void Agent::loadConf(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &config) {
00340   if( !is_tag(config, "Agent") ) 
00341     throw XmlError(config, "Not an Agent node");
00342   // Extract attributes
00343   try {
00344     Symbol name(parse_attr<std::string>(config, "name"));
00345     if( name.empty() )
00346       throw XmlError(config, "Agent name is empty.");
00347     set_name(name);
00348     m_finalTick = parse_attr<TICK>(config, "finalTick");
00349     if( m_finalTick<=0 ) 
00350       throw XmlError(config, "agent life time should be greater than 0");
00351   } catch(bad_string_cast const &e) {
00352     throw XmlError(config, e.what());
00353   }
00354   // Populate with external configuration
00355   ext_xml(config.second, "config");
00356 
00357 
00358   // Now iterate through the sub-tags 
00359   if( config.second.empty() )
00360     throw XmlError(config, "Agent node does not have sub nodes.");
00361   boost::property_tree::ptree::assoc_iterator i, last;
00362   
00363   // First load the plugins :
00364   syslog()<<"Loading plug-ins...";
00365   boost::tie(i, last) = config.second.equal_range("Plugin");
00366   for( ; last!=i; ++i )
00367     loadPlugin(*i);
00368 
00369   // Look for A clock : Note only the first clock found is used
00370   if( NULL==m_clock ) {
00371     SingletonUse<Clock::xml_factory> clk_f;
00372     boost::property_tree::ptree::iterator c = config.second.begin();
00373 
00374     clk_f->iter_produce(c, config.second.end(), m_clock);
00375   }
00376   // List the reactors available for helping the user :
00377   SingletonUse<xml_factory> reactor_f;
00378   
00379   // First look for the reactor types available
00380   std::list<Symbol> reactors_types;
00381 
00382   reactor_f->getIds(reactors_types);
00383   if( reactors_types.empty() ) {
00384     syslog("ERROR")<<"No reactor type available.";
00385   } else {
00386     // Display the list of reactor types
00387     std::ostringstream oss;
00388 
00389     while( !reactors_types.empty() ) {
00390       oss<<"\n\t- "<<reactors_types.front();
00391       reactors_types.pop_front();
00392     }
00393     syslog()<<"Loading reactors; available reactor types are :"<<oss.str();
00394 
00395     add_reactors(config.second);                   
00396   }
00397   
00398   // Now load and post the goals 
00399   syslog()<<"load initial goals of the agent";
00400   sendRequests(config.second);
00401 }
00402 
00403 void Agent::loadConf(std::string const &file_name) {
00404   bool found;
00405   std::string name = manager().use(file_name, found);
00406   if( !found ) {
00407     name = manager().use(file_name+".cfg", found);
00408     if( !found )
00409       throw ErrnoExcept("Unable to locate "+file_name);
00410   }
00411   boost::property_tree::ptree agent;
00412   read_xml(name, agent, xml::no_comments|xml::trim_whitespace);
00413 
00414   if( agent.empty() )
00415     throw TREX::utils::Exception(std::string("Configuration file : \"")+
00416                              file_name+"\" is empty.");
00417   if( agent.size()!=1 )
00418     throw TREX::utils::Exception(std::string("Configuration file : \"")+
00419                              file_name+"\" have multiple roots.");
00420   loadConf(agent.front());
00421 }
00422 
00423 void Agent::initComplete() {
00424   if( getName().empty() ) 
00425     throw AgentException(*this, "Agent has no name :"
00426                       " You probably forgot to initialize it.");
00427   if( NULL==m_clock )
00428     throw AgentException(*this, "Agent is not connected to a clock");
00429   // Complete the init for the reactors and check that there's no cycle
00430   details::init_visitor init(m_finalTick);
00431   boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(init));
00432   size_t n_failed = cleanup();
00433   if( n_failed>0 ) 
00434     syslog("WARN")<<n_failed<<" reactors failed to initialize.";
00435   
00436   // Check for missing timelines 
00437   for(timeline_iterator it=timeline_begin(); timeline_end()!=it; ++it) 
00438     if( !(*it)->owned() ) 
00439       syslog("WARN")<<"Timeline \""<<(*it)->name()<<"\" has no owner.";
00440   
00441 
00442   // Create initial graph file
00443   std::string graph_dot = manager().file_name("reactors.dot");
00444   std::ofstream dotf(graph_dot.c_str());
00445   
00446   graph_names_writer gn;
00447   boost::write_graphviz(dotf, me(), gn, gn);
00448   syslog()<<"Initial graph logged in \"reactors.dot\".";
00449 
00450 
00451   // start the clock
00452   m_clock->doStart();
00453   syslog("START")<<"\t=========================================================";
00454 }
00455 
00456 void Agent::run() {
00457   initComplete();
00458   while( doNext() );
00459   syslog()<<"Mission completed."<<std::endl;
00460 }
00461 
00462 
00463 void Agent::synchronize() {
00464   details::sync_scheduller::reactor_queue queue;
00465   details::sync_scheduller sync(queue);
00466   m_edf.clear(); // Make sure that there's no one left in the schedulling
00467 
00468   // Identify synchronization order while notifying of the new tick
00469   boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(sync));
00470   // Execute synchronization
00471   //  - could be done with a dfs but we choose for now to do it using the
00472   //  output list of sync_scheduller to avoid a potentially costfull graph
00473   //  exploration.
00474   while( !queue.empty() ) {
00475     reactor_id r = queue.front();
00476     queue.pop_front();
00477     // Update timelines for r
00478     r->doNotify();
00479 
00480     // synchronization
00481     if( r->doSynchronize() ) {
00482       double wr = r->workRatio();
00483 
00484       if( !std::isnan(wr) ) {
00485        // this reactor has deliberation :
00486        //   - add it to the edf scheduler
00487        m_edf.insert(std::make_pair(wr, r));
00488       }
00489     } else {
00490       // r failed => kill the reactor
00491       kill_reactor(r);
00492     }
00493   }
00494 }
00495 
00496 bool Agent::executeReactor() {
00497   if( m_edf.empty() )
00498     return false;
00499   else {
00500     double wr;
00501     reactor_id r;
00502 
00503     boost::tie(wr, r) = *(m_edf.begin());
00504     // syslog("step")<<"Executing reactor "<<r->getName()<<" (wr="<<wr<<")";
00505     m_edf.erase(m_edf.begin());
00506     r->step();
00507 
00508     wr = r->workRatio();
00509     if( !std::isnan(wr) ) {
00510       // syslog("step")<<"New work ratio for "<<r->getName()<<" is "<<wr;
00511       m_edf.insert(std::make_pair(wr, r));
00512       return true;
00513     }
00514     return !m_edf.empty();
00515   }
00516 }
00517     
00518 bool Agent::doNext() {
00519   if( missionCompleted() ) {
00520     if( empty() )
00521       syslog()<<"No more reactor active.";    
00522     syslog("END")<<"\t=========================================================";
00523     return false;
00524   }
00525   synchronize();
00526   
00527   while( m_clock->getNextTick()==getCurrentTick() && executeReactor() );
00528   while( m_clock->getNextTick()==getCurrentTick() )
00529     m_clock->sleep();
00530   
00531   updateTick(m_clock->getNextTick());
00532 
00533   return true;
00534 }
00535 
00536 void Agent::sendRequest(goal_id const &g) {
00537   if( !has_timeline(g->object()) )
00538     syslog("WARN")<<"Posting goal on a unknnown timeline \""<<g->object()<<"\".";
00539   m_proxy->postRequest(g);
00540 }
00541 
00542 size_t Agent::sendRequests(boost::property_tree::ptree &g) {
00543   size_t ret = 0;
00544   boost::property_tree::ptree::assoc_iterator i, last;
00545   boost::tie(i, last) = g.equal_range("Goal");
00546   if( last==i ) 
00547     syslog("WARN")<<"No goal found in this file";
00548   else {
00549     for(; last!=i; ++i) {
00550       sendRequest(*i);
00551       ++ret;
00552     }
00553     syslog()<<ret<<" goal"<<(ret>1?"s":"")<<" loaded.";
00554   } 
00555   return ret;
00556 }
